Name: CyrenThreatIntelligence
Author: Cyren - support@cyren.com
Description: The [Cyren Threat Intelligence](https://www.cyren.com/) solution provides the capability to ingest Cyren IP reputation and malware URL threat intelligence into Microsoft Sentinel using the Codeless Connector Framework (CCF). This solution deploys REST API poller connectors, a custom log table, data collection rules, analytics rules, and visualization workbook to help security teams detect and investigate network-based threats.
Analytic Rules: Analytic Rules/Cyren - High Risk IP Indicators.yaml
Analytic Rules/Cyren - High Risk URL Indicators.yaml
